

;----------------
;----------------
; hit spark
; s [0] ; sparkno = 0
; m [1] ; sparkno = 1
; l [2] ; sparkno = 2
; sp[3] ; sparkno = 3
; hp[4] ; sparkno = 4
;----------------
;----------------
; light hit spark / normal
; 通常-小
[begin action 0]
6600,110,0,0,3,,a,0.5,0.5
6600,101,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,1
6600,102,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,2
6600,103,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,3
6600,104,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,4
6600,105,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,5
6600,106,0,0,1,,a,0.5,0.5;,6
;---------------
; medium(=small) hit spark / normal
; 通常-中(小)
[begin action 1]
6600,110,0,0,4,,a,0.6,0.6
6600,101,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,1
6600,102,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,2
6600,103,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,3
6600,104,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,4
6600,105,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,5
6600,106,0,0,1,,a,0.6,0.6;,6
;---------------
; strong hit spark / normal
; 通常-強
[begin action 2]
6600,110,0,0,5,,a,0.7,0.7
6600,101,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,1
6600,102,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,2
6600,103,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,3
6600,104,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,4
6600,105,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,5
6600,106,0,0,1,,a,0.7,0.7;,6
;----------------
; strong hit spark / special acts
; 強
[begin action 3]

6600,201,0,0,1,,a,0.8,0.8;,1
6600,202,0,0,1,,a,0.8,0.8;,2

;--------------------------
; type 5 (timer)
; タイプ５(タイマー)
;--------------------------

; base
[begin action 104000]
1005,0,0,0,1
; timer bar
[begin action 104010]
1005,1,0,0,1
; time mark(left)
[begin action 104020]
1005,2,-50,0,2
1005,2,-20,0,2
1005,2, -8,0,2
1005,2, -4,0,2
1005,2, -2,0,2
1005,2, -1,0,2
loopstart
1005,2, 0,0,2
1005,2, 0,0,2
; time mark(right)
[begin action 104021]
1005,2,50,0,2
1005,2,20,0,2
1005,2, 8,0,2
1005,2, 4,0,2
1005,2, 2,0,2
1005,2, 1,0,2
loopstart
1005,2, 0,0,2
1005,2, 0,0,2





;--------------------------
;--------------------------
; lifebar / life bar
; ライフバー

;; no damage (white) ; ノーダメージ状態
[begin action 200000]
2000,200,0,0,-1
;; yellow ; 黄
[begin action 200010]
2000,210,0,0,-1
[begin action 200020]
2000,220,0,0,-1
;; red ; 赤
[begin action 200030]
2000,230,0,0,-1
[begin action 200040]
2000,240,0,0,-1

;; damage bar ; ダメージバー
